message:
No worries. I've been working on an app that works like DropBox, and I'm using SignalR to send real-time file upload notifications to all connected clients.

It seems to me that there's not a lot of info out there on SignalR. I did buy this book: [https://www.amazon.com/Sign...](https://www.amazon.com/SignalR-Programming-Microsoft-Developer-Reference/dp/0735683883/ref=sr_1_2?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1479409224&sr=1-2&keywords=SignalR "https://www.amazon.com/SignalR-Programming-Microsoft-Developer-Reference/dp/0735683883/ref=sr_1_2?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1479409224&sr=1-2&keywords=SignalR")

... but assumes you're a Java dev, which I'm not. The MS website for SignalR is OK, and there are some mediocre samples. Just curious if you knew of any other resources.  
BTW, great blog. Keep it up.
